member.name: M:Genesis.Graphics.Camera.ConvertScreenToWorldOrtho(Genesis.Graphics.Viewport,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Converts screen coordinates to world coordinates using an orthographic projection.
member.param: The viewport object that defines the dimensions of the screen space.
The x-coordinate of the screen position to convert.
The y-coordinate of the screen position to convert.
member.returns: A Vec3 object representing the corresponding world coordinates.
member.remarks: This method assumes an orthographic projection and calculates the world coordinates based on the screen position, the camera's position, and the size of the viewport. The screen coordinates are first normalized to a range of [-1, 1], then adjusted according to the camera's position and size.
